page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT IN WINCANTON 1
page.content: Many of our parents enjoy skittles, darts, pool and country & western music in the local pubs,clubs & hotels "My father is a{country dance}caller. He arranges the programme with the band and explains the dance movements to the people." The{Memorial Hall}is a centre of entertainment.Indoor bowls are popular The annual Autumn{carnivals}are an important part of Somerset tradition. Our local club has its own trailer and generator and prepares a float each year.The 25 members raise money by holding jumble sales, discos, money- trails etc. Our carnival is organised by{Wincanton Carnival Committee.}They arrange for judges, prizes, entries, assembly points,marshalling and raise money to pay for the event. Most of the 33 children in our class have taken part in carnivals.
